text: The T-37A was an amphibious Soviet light tank. It was the first mass-produced light tank in the world. In service, the tanks mainly did communication, reconnaissance, and infantry support tasks. == Operators == * * Germany - Captured a few examples * - 29 tanks * - At least 19 tanks * - Some captured tanks * - One tank gifted by Finland, for brief evaluation only * - 1 T-37A [1934-194?]. ==References== Category:Tanks
title: T-37A tank
